epc.spec
Class ECReportSpec

java.lang.Object
  epc.spec.Spec
      epc.spec.ECReportSpec

public class ECReportSpec
extends Spec

An ECReportSpec specifies one report to be included in the list of reports that results from executing an event cycle.

Field Summary
private  ECFilterSpec filterSpec
          Specifies how Tags are filtered before inclusion in the report.
private  ECGroupSpec groupSpec
          Specifies how filtered Tags are grouped together for reporting.
private  ECReportOutputSpec output
          Specifies which fields to report from each Tag or a count, or both.
private  java.lang.Boolean reportIfEmpty
          Specifies whether to omit the ECReport instance if the final set of Tags is empty
private  java.lang.String reportName
          Specifies a name for reports generated from this ECReportSpec.
private  java.lang.Boolean reportOnlyOnChange
          Specifies whether to omit the ECReport instance if the set of filtered Tags is unchanged from the previous event cycle.
private  ECReportSetSpec reportSet
          Specifies what set of Tags are considered for reporting: CURRENT, ADDITIONS, or DELETIONS .
private  ECStatProfileName[] statProfileNames
          An ordered list that specifies zero or more statistics profiles that govern what statistics are to be included in the report.

Field Detail

reportName

private java.lang.String reportName
Specifies a name for reports generated from this ECReportSpec. The ALE implementation SHALL copy this name into the ECReport instance generated from this ECReportSpec.

reportSet

private ECReportSetSpec reportSet
Specifies what set of Tags are considered for reporting: CURRENT, ADDITIONS, or DELETIONS .

filterSpec

private ECFilterSpec filterSpec
Specifies how Tags are filtered before inclusion in the report.

groupSpec

private ECGroupSpec groupSpec
Specifies how filtered Tags are grouped together for reporting.

output

private ECReportOutputSpec output
Specifies which fields to report from each Tag or a count, or both.

reportIfEmpty

private java.lang.Boolean reportIfEmpty
Specifies whether to omit the ECReport instance if the final set of Tags is empty

reportOnlyOnChange

private java.lang.Boolean reportOnlyOnChange
Specifies whether to omit the ECReport instance if the set of filtered Tags is unchanged from the previous event cycle.

statProfileNames

private ECStatProfileName[] statProfileNames
An ordered list that specifies zero or more statistics profiles that govern what statistics are to be included in the report.
